sentences.sContent: "What are you thinking?" he asked curiously.
sentences.sCn: “你在想什么？” 他好奇地问道。

sentences.sContent: Carmen Elcira introduced herself to him that night, fumbling with her English, and he, smiling curiously at her, invited her to come out with the band to get a drink.
sentences.sContent_eng: Carmen Elcira introduced herself to him that night, fumbling with her English, and he, smiling curiously at her, invited her to come out with the band to get a drink.
sentences.sCn: 那晚，卡门·艾尔茜拉用磕磕巴巴的英语向他做了自我介绍，而他呢，好奇地冲着她微笑，邀请她和乐队一起去喝酒。

words.tran: 好奇的，有求知欲的；古怪的；爱挑剔的
好奇，好奇心；珍品，古董，古玩
